statements: DELETE FROM TrainSchedules WHERE destination = 'New York'
DELETE FROM TrainSchedules WHERE train_id = 123 AND destination = 'New York';
DELETE FROM TrainSchedules WHERE departure_time < '12:00:00' OR arrival_time > '18:00:00';
DELETE FROM train_schedule WHERE train_id = 100 AND destination = 'New York';
DELETE FROM track_maintenance_records WHERE track_id = 50 AND maintenance_date = '2022-10-05';
DELETE FROM TrainSchedule WHERE train_id = 10 AND departure_time < '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM TrackMaintenance WHERE maintenance_id > 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Major' AND worker_id IN (SELECT worker_id FROM MaintenanceWorkers WHERE worker_role = 'Senior Technician');
DELETE FROM station_information WHERE station_name = 'Central Station';
DELETE FROM Track WHERE track_type = 'main' AND track_length > 100;
